actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to provide for the distribution to Amtrak of 50 percent of the funds received by the United States for any sale of Conrail.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to deposit 50 percent of Consolidated Rail Corporation (Conrail) common stock sale proceeds into a Treasury account earmarked for payment to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (AMTRAK) according to a specified schedule.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the distribution to Amtrak of 50 percent of the funds received by the United States for any sale of Conrail.
